title: Which IHT forms did you complete to report the estate’s value?
question: Which IHT forms did you complete to report the estate’s value?
optionIHT400421Hint: Forms you completed because you have to pay inheritance tax
optionIHT207Hint: Forms you completed because you do not have to pay inheritance tax because it’s an excepted estate and the person who’s died was domiciled abroad
